price: Àti pé Wọ́n máa san ẹ̀mí kọ̀ọ̀kan ní ẹ̀san ohun tí ó ṣe níṣẹ́. Allāhu sì nímọ̀ jùlọ nípa ohun tí wọ́n ń ṣe níṣẹ́.
arabic: وَوُفِّيَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّا عَمِلَتۡ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wawuffiyat kullu nafsin mā ʿamilat wahuwa aʿlamu bimā yafʿalūna
